title: Today I Played Elise Mid.
body:
So today, an average day on league having fun, playing ranked... 
And I thought I'd play something old in the mid lane...
I locked in Elise mid.

It wasn't until I got in game my team realized what they had mid.
One of those players verbally attacked me to the point I wasn't playing a game but was having a 1 v 1 essay writing competition.
It was no longer league of legends but my high school English class.

I was in utter shock. for playing this game since its beta and realizing how rotten the community can be, I'm not saying all this hasn't happened before but the fact that it happens on and on and I see familiar igns that have expressed such vulgar hatred towards me, I wonder are y'all doing anything (@riot). 
I'm not one to come on the boards and vent but damn I've had it!

replies.body: Meta monkeys are always around. Just ignore and have fun playing the game how you want tbh.

lmao love this!

xD

Meta monkeys are most of the new league players from season 5 onwards

-#Season1/2/3/4Represent!
Maybe he should play what ever he wants and you should go play what ever you want?

yeah?

sounds like that guy is a **meta monkey**~
Lol yea this happened to me when I went leblanc support. I ended up carrying 2 games with her. I really hate it when people rage cause you "don't follow the meta"...
